DefaultMode.title: 🔋 Default Callout Mode
DefaultMode.description: The default display mode for Callout: Title mode (big text) or Paragraph mode (small text)

EmojiFont.title: 🇫 Callout Icon Emoji Font Style
EmojiFont.description: Specify the emoji font style for Callout icons (CSS field)

CustomCSS.title: 🎨 Custom CSS
CustomCSS.description: Fill in any custom CSS styles

CalloutOrder.title: 📋 Callout Menu Item Order
CalloutOrder.description:
• The order in which Callouts appear in the menu (Callout ID) separated by a comma (,) or semicolon (;)
  • Callouts not listed here will not appear in the menu, but their styles will still be effective
  • If left blank, the default order will be used

DefaultCallout.title: 📋 Default Callout List
DefaultCallout.description: Below is the list of built-in Callouts. You can modify the default styles here

CustomCallout.title: 📋 Custom Callout List
CustomCallout.description: Below is the list of custom Callouts. You can add, modify, or delete Callouts here

Delete.title: 🗑️ Confirm Delete Callout?
Delete.description:
Callout [{0} {1}] has {2} references!
Deletion is irreversible, please proceed with caution

CalloutEditor.exists: Callout ID already exists. Please change the ID
CalloutEditor.empty: Callout ID cannot be empty. Please enter a new ID
CalloutEditor.changed:
⚠️ Callout ID has been changed from {0} to {1}. This may cause previous callouts to become invalid.
❓ Do you want to proceed with the change?
